text: Cloud PDR method for multi-criteria decision making with incomplete system
Yuan Xumei, Wang Yana, Zhang Xu (School of Management &Economics,Yanshan University,Qinhuangdao Hebei O66ooo,China)

Abstract:Aimingatthesignificanceofthe multi-criteriadecision making problemand the insuficientoftheclasical rough set method inthe project scheduling problems of incompletesystem,a multi-criteria decision making methodof incomplete systemcombined with cloud probabilistic dominancerelation (cloud PDR)is proposed in this paperbasedon the predecessors' probabilistic dominance relation (PDR)sorting method.The parameters such as expectation,entropyand super entropyare introduced intothePDR method considering the fuzzinessvolatilityandrandomnessofthedecision simultaneouslywhose evaluation proceses and results are more objective and comprehensive.Taking the development levelofcoalresource-based cityas aexample,thearticleobtainsthe sortingofeachcityand meanwhileverifiestheadvantagesandtheefectivenesof the method by comparing with other methods.
Key Words: multi-criteria decision making;rough set; incomplete system; cloud PDR method;coalresource typeï¼›urban development level

U , A , V , f \right.$ ä¸ºä¸å®Œå¤‡ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œå¯¹ $\forall x _ { i }$ ï¼Œ$x _ { _ { j } } \in U$ ï¼Œ $a \in A$ ï¼Œç§° $p _ { _ a } ( x _ { _ i } , x _ { _ j } )$ ä¸ºå¯¹è±¡ $\boldsymbol { x } _ { { } _ { j } }$ ç›¸æ¯”äº $x _ { i }$ åœ¨å±æ€§ $\mathbf { \Psi } _ { a }$ ä¸‹å–å€¼çš„ä¼˜åŠ¿åº¦ã€‚è‹¥åœ¨ $\mathbf { \Psi } _ { a }$ ä¸‹ $x _ { _ j } > x _ { _ i }$ ï¼Œåˆ™ $\boldsymbol { x } _ { j }$ ç›¸æ¯”äº $x _ { i }$ åœ¨ $\mathbf { \Psi } _ { a }$ ä¸‹å–å€¼çš„ä¼˜åŠ¿åº¦ä¸º1ï¼Œå³ $x _ { _ j } \succ x _ { _ i }$ ï¼›è‹¥åœ¨ $\mathbf { \Delta } _ { a }$ ä¸‹ $x _ { _ j } < x _ { _ i }$ ï¼Œåˆ™ $\boldsymbol { x } _ { j }$ ç›¸æ¯”äº $x _ { i }$ åœ¨ $\mathbf { \Delta } _ { a }$ ä¸‹å–å€¼çš„ä¼˜åŠ¿åº¦ä¸º0ï¼Œå³ $x _ { _ j } \prec x _ { _ i }$ ï¼›è‹¥åœ¨ $\mathbf { \Psi } _ { a }$ ä¸‹ $x _ { _ j } = x _ { _ i }$ æˆ–å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼ä¸ºç¼ºçœå€¼ $( ^ { * } )$ ï¼Œåˆ™ $\boldsymbol { x } _ { { } _ { j } }$ ç›¸æ¯”äº $x _ { i }$ åœ¨ $\mathbf { \Psi } _ { a }$ ä¸‹å–å€¼çš„ä¼˜åŠ¿åº¦ä¸º0.5ï¼Œå³ $x _ { _ { j } } \sim x _ { _ { i } }$ ã€‚ï¼ˆå…¶ä¸­â€œ $\succ$ â€è¡¨ç¤ºâ€œä¼˜äºâ€ï¼Œâ€œï½â€è¡¨ç¤ºâ€œä¸ç›¸ä¸Šä¸‹â€ï¼Œâ€œ $\prec ^ { \prime \prime }$ è¡¨ç¤ºâ€œåŠ£äº")ã€‚å› æ­¤ï¼Œå¯¹è±¡ $\boldsymbol { x } _ { j }$ åœ¨å…¨ä½“å±æ€§é›† $A$ ä¸‹ä¸åŠ£äº $x _ { i }$ çš„ä¼˜åŠ¿åº¦å¯è®°ä¸º $p _ { _ A } ( x _ { _ i } , x _ { _ j } )$ ï¼Œå…¶ä¸º $p _ { _ a } ( x _ { _ i } , x _ { _ j } )$ ä¸­å–å€¼ä¸º1çš„å±æ€§ä¸ªæ•°ä¸Pa(xi,xj)ä¸­å–å€¼ä¸º0.5 çš„å±æ€§ä¸ªæ•°ä¹‹å’Œä¸å…¨ä½“å±æ€§é›†æ•°é‡çš„æ¯”å€¼ã€‚

$H _ { e }$ ä¸‰ä¸ªç‰¹å¾ä¸‹ä¸å®Œå¤‡ç³»ç»Ÿ $s$ åœ¨ $A$ ä¸‹çš„ $\alpha$ æ¦‚ç‡äº‘ä¼˜åŠ¿å…³ç³»( $E _ { x }$ ï¼‰ä»¥åŠç›¸åº”çš„å¯¹è±¡ $x _ { i }$ çš„ $\alpha$ æ¦‚ç‡äº‘ä¼˜åŠ¿ç±» $\big (  \left[ x _ { i } \right] _ { A } ^ { \flat \alpha } , \left[ x _ { i } \right] _ { A } ^ { \prime \prime \circ \alpha } , \left[ x _ { i } \right] _ { A } ^ { \prime \prime \prime \circ \alpha } \big )$ å³$R _ { \mathrm { \Lambda } } ^ { \smash { \prime } \mathrm { { ^ { s c } } } } = \bigl \{ \bigl ( x _ { i } , x _ { j } \bigr ) \bigl | p _ { \mathrm { \Lambda } _ { A } } ^ { \cdot } \bigl ( x _ { i } , x _ { j } \bigr ) \geq \alpha , 0 . 5 \leq \alpha \leq 1 \bigr \} , \bigl [ x _ { i } \bigr ] _ { \mathrm { \Lambda } _ { A } } ^ { \smash { \prime } \mathrm { { ^ { s c } } } } = \bigl \{ x _ { j } \mathopen { } \mathclose \bgroup \left| \bigl ( x _ { i } , x _ { j } \bigr ) \in R _ { \mathrm { \Lambda } _ { A } } ^ { \smash { \prime } \mathrm { { ^ { s c } } } } \aftergroup \egroup \right. \bigr \}$ $R _ { \ A } ^ { * _ { 2 \alpha } } = \left\{ \left( x _ { i } , x _ { j } \right) \Big | p _ { \ A } ^ { \cdot } \left( x _ { i } , x _ { j } \right) \geq \alpha , 0 . 5 \leq \alpha \leq 1 \right\} , \left[ x _ { i } \right] _ { \ A } ^ { * _ { 2 \alpha } } = \left\{ x _ { j } \Big | \left( x _ { i } , x _ { j } \right) \in R _ { \ A } ^ { * _ { 2 \alpha } } \right\}$ $\bar { R ^ { * _ { \alpha } } } = \left\{ \left( x _ { i } , x _ { j } \right) \middle | p ^ { * } _ { \mathrm { \alpha } _ { A } } \left( x _ { i } , x _ { j } \right) \geq \alpha , 0 . 5 \leq \alpha \leq 1 \right\} , \left[ x _ { i } \right] _ { \mathrm { \alpha } _ { A } } ^ { * _ { \alpha } } = \left\{ \left. x _ { j } \right| \left( x _ { i } , x _ { j } \right) \in R _ { \mathrm { \alpha } _ { A } } ^ { * _ { \alpha } } \right\}$
